answers.answer: Its normal to pee a lot. If you notice its way overboard on the trips to the bathroom call your doctor. Could be a sign of a uti, bladder infection, or like in my case gestational diabetes.

question: soooo im a day away from being twenty weeks and I go pee a lot like it feels like I pee more than I should jw if thats normal cuz literally 10 mins after I go pee I have to pee again I dont know if I might have an infection or if thats normal first pregnancy so im always worried about something even know I shouldn't think the worst.
title: normal?
